entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
